TopicTitle: Ye won't believe it but I've found new easter eggs!

Articles.Content:
This is incredible my friends! Has Squad inserted new easter eggs in KSP or is something else going on? Never have I seen these before! Have a look and try to find a scientific or superstition based conclusion with me. I'm baffled. And hungry. Sort of.

They seem at a glance to be arranged in a certain geometry, some say they reflect the departure of a long lost prophet or a constellation in the night sky. Others say it's a symbol about the reproduction system of kerbals. I can't figure that one out, but in any way it seems distasteful. I mean ... no-one wants to know about these things, right? Exchanging bodily fluids and all... yuck. My mother always told me that I need to wash my hands before dinner and after visiting the toilet. That's gotta be to protect me from something vile and such. There was this boy once ... what? Allright my GF wants me to STFU and get on with it.

The most important question of all: can we eat them? They look tasty! After all these veggies my mother & my girlfriend gave me I'm dying for some carbohydrates. And a lot of beer. Maybe some german beer. And at the end some 47% slovenian slivovka. I wonder if the supermarket is open.

Hey but give your view on the subject!
Well, my plan today was to make a single mission to find all the easter eggs for myself, I see you already have them.
Where did you find them?
Must be 'shopped, they're not at my KSC
'Shopped or modded?

What. o.o

//10 char

The most important question of all: can we eat them? They look tasty! After all these veggies my mother & my girlfriend gave me I'm dying for some carbohydrates. And a lot of beer. Maybe some german beer. And at the end some 47% slovenian slivovka. I wonder if the supermarket is open.

God damnit, now I'm hungry. I guess I'll also have to send a mission to the supermarket
If you look closely, you can see they were Photoshopped in. Still, I encourage everyone to open their KSP game to check for themselves.
mabye there is a special download today?
Time for a full fledged manned mission to the fridge.
Looks like re-textured whack-a-kerbal projectiles.

Ah, it seems Squad is finally implementing spherical-ish fuel tanks!

And at the end some 47% slovenian slivovka.

Please do share some information on where you got this, because I've never seen any and need it for...research purposes

Nope, no photoshop or retextured whack-a-kerbal objects.

@Ravenchant: the stuff I drank was made at some home in the Postojna region, can't tell more ;-)

Nope, no photoshop or retextured whack-a-kerbal objects.

Maybe it has something to do with this? I want an official Squad statement.

Maybe it has something to do with this? I want an official Squad statement.

That's procedural fairings

What part in the base game would produce that much light?

If it IS real, my first guess would be that asteroids can be a food other than potatoes.

Looks like a part from WWK1 'Going green by enterelysium on YouTube.

I made them, using Procedural Parts.

Really a fantastic mod.

Really a fantastic mod.

The illuminator MK1
